title: Sweet Redemption
description: When race car driver Drake Kincaid finds his wife in an extremely compromising position he loses his damn mind. Thankfully he was too mad to aim straight and the shots went wide but now he's pissed. He's sworn off women for good, doesn't even want to see one on paper, but then the sweet Cherry Ann a girl from the wrong side of the tracks starts worming her way under his skin and it's not long before the young beauty finds herself under Drake. Adamantly set against marriage what's the stubborn Drake to do when his young lover ends up pregnant with his child? This is a short story of app 15,000 words
author: Jordan Silver
